summary: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...
cast: Jean Servais|Carl Möhner|Robert Manuel|Janine Darcey|Pierre Grasset|Robert Hossein|Marcel Lupovici|Dominique Maurin|Magali Noël|Marie Sabouret|Claude Sylvain|Jules Dassin|Armandel|Alain Bouvette|Alice Garan|André Dalibert|Jacques David|Émile Genevois|Marcelle Hainia|Marcel Lesieur|Daniel Mendaille|Huguette Montréal|Lita Recio|Jacques Besnard|Teddy Bilis|Jenny Doria|René Hell|Gilbert Moreau|Maryse Paillet|Marcel Rouzé|Roger Rudel|Fernand Sardou
title: Rififi
